name: METAVOIDAL
description:
NOTE: THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA BUILD

This is an early alpha, and there are a couple of bugs and unfinished bits. We plan to keep developing the game by adding more levels, corrupted monster types, things to throw and epic corrupted metal-band bosses - and much more!

Please take a moment to leave us some feedback on any of our channels :)



Your parents were right, metal will corrupt you...

Heavy Metal has corrupted your small town, turning everything around you into monstrous creatures - the only safe place left is the sanctuary, the church. Or so they told you...

Play as a drummer who learns that the sanctuary is not as safe as it seems, and that the Metal Band in charge is farming aspiring drummers as their sacrificial offerings.

Face the music, and the corruption it causes, and try to get out alive by escaping the clutches of the evil Band. 

Metavoidal is a brawler roguelite RPG where you play as a drummer who has to fight their way out of the clutches of a corrupted band and their cult. With every level you climb, the stronger you will get. But at what cost?

VERSION 0.2.1 KNOWN ISSUES:

  • Some  So Many Bugs
  • Playing with a controller makes throwing items a bit weird
  • Baby zombies are a little too aggressive
